explanations.machine learning: The paper proposes a unified machine learning model (UMLM) for various tasks, indicating a strong focus on machine learning.
explanations.supervised learning: The paper discusses two-class classification and regression, which are supervised learning tasks.
explanations.classification: The paper explicitly mentions two-class classification as one of the tasks addressed by the UMLM.
explanations.regression: The paper explicitly mentions regression as one of the tasks addressed by the UMLM.
explanations.support vector machine: The paper mentions support vector machine-based models as part of the UMLM framework.
explanations.SVM: SVM is an abbreviation for support vector machine, which is mentioned in the paper.
